data.title: Environment and Climate Change Canada
data.meta_description: historical climate data web site is a gateway to information on matters such as past (hourly, daily, monthly and almanac) weather includes: temperature, snow, snow on ground, precipitation, rain, wind speed and direction, heating and cooling degree days, visibility, relative humidity, wind chill and humidex in Canada.
data.text: An option to view station locations on a map and download daily data from multiple stations in bulk in either CSV or GeoJSON format is available from the Canadian Centre for Climate Services and ClimateData.ca websites.
